title: Happy Birthday, Chika-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Ehehe~, I got congratulated a lot today~. The cake everyone decorated together was so delicious~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, we prepared a lot mikan just for you, Chika-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>A cake where I can put as much mikan as I want is like a dream, a dream I tell you! Aah~, I’m so happy~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’s fun to be able to celebrate with everyone like this, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah! But getting congratulated as the very first thing of the day is like a special kind of happiness….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>….Chika-chan, you’re still sleepy, right? I wanted to be the first person to congratulate you no matter what, so we just kept chatting through the window….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeh!? My sleepiness is already blown away, you know!? Because the congratulations through the window was a surprise from you, right, Riko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Chika-chan….! Umm, once again, happy birthday. Because I have you as my neighbor, Chika-chan…. everyday has been really fun<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I feel the same way~. Since you became my neighbor, Riko-chan, everyday has been fun too! Let’s be friends forever, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
